actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to require that 20 percent of new units in public housing projects be available for occupancy by large families.

summary.text: Requires, under the United States Housing Act of 1937, that 20 percent of new units in public housing projects shall have at least three bedrooms. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 1410, 1407)

titles.title: A bill to amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to require that 20 percent of new units in public housing projects be available for occupancy by large families.
